subject: Music
title: The East Coast vs. West Coast Feud
description: One-minute skill: The East Coast vs. West Coast Feud.

hook.text: The rivalry between East and West Coast hip-hop cost two legends their lives.

buildup.text: Bad Boy Records in New York and Death Row in LA became bitter commercial and personal rivals.

discovery.text: Media coverage amplified the beef, turning artistic competition into dangerous confrontation.

twist.text: Both Tupac and Notorious B.I.G. were murdered within six months â€” neither case was ever solved.

climax.text: The tragedy forced hip-hop to reckon with the real consequences of glorifying violence.

punchline.text: Two voices silenced. A whole culture forced to grow up.

quiz.question: What was the outcome of the East Coast vs. West Coast rivalry?
options: Both Tupac and Notorious B.I.G. were killed in unsolved murders
They collaborated on a hit album
